trans-unit.source: Enables setting message-level security properties on the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding"></xref> binding.
trans-unit.target: 可讓上設定訊息層級安全性屬性<xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding"></xref>繫結。

trans-unit.source: This object is accessed from the binding by means of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding.Security%2A> property, which returns a <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqSecurity> object.
trans-unit.target: 從藉由繫結存取這個物件<xref:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding.Security%2A>屬性，它會傳回<xref:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqSecurity>物件。</xref:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqSecurity> </xref:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding.Security%2A>

trans-unit.source: This object has a <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqSecurity.Message%2A> property that provides a reference to the MessageSecurityOverMsmq object.
trans-unit.target: 此物件具有<xref:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqSecurity.Message%2A>提供 MessageSecurityOverMsmq 物件的參考屬性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqSecurity.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverMsmq"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverMsmq"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the algorithm suite used for security messages at the SOAP level.
trans-unit.target: 指定用於 SOAP 層級之安全性訊息的演算法套件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite> defines of a variety of algorithms such as Canonicalization, Digest, KeyWrap, Signature, Encryption, and KeyDerivation algorithms.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite>定義各種不同的演算法，例如標準化、 摘要式、 KeyWrap、 簽章、 加密和 KeyDerivation 演算法。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite>

trans-unit.source: This property is most relevant when working with a platform that uses a set of algorithms different than the default.
trans-unit.target: 使用平台是利用一組和預設值不同的演算法時，這個屬性就非常重要。

trans-unit.source: You should be aware of the strengths and weaknesses of the relevant algorithms when making modifications to this property.
trans-unit.target: 在修改這個屬性時，您應該了解相關演算法的優缺點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite"></xref> setting for messages sent over the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding"></xref> binding.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite"> </xref>透過傳送的訊息設定<xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding"></xref>繫結。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageCredentialType> security setting for messages sent over the MSMQ transport.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageCredentialType>透過 MSMQ 傳輸傳送之訊息的安全性設定。</xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageCredentialType>

trans-unit.source: This property can be set to one of the following values: - **None**: This allows the service to interact with anonymous clients.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以設定為下列值之一:-**無**︰ 這會允許服務與匿名用戶端互動。

trans-unit.source: Neither the service nor the client requires a credential.
trans-unit.target: 服務和用戶端都不需要認證。

trans-unit.source: - **Windows**: This allows the SOAP exchanges to be under the authenticated context of a Windows credential.
trans-unit.target: - **Windows**︰ 這可讓 SOAP 交換加入 Windows 認證的已驗證的內容。

trans-unit.source: This always performs Kerberos-based authentication.
trans-unit.target: 如此一定會執行 Kerberos 驗證。

trans-unit.source: - **UserName**: This allows the service to require that the client be authenticated using a UserName credential.
trans-unit.target: - **UserName**︰ 這可讓服務要求用戶端會使用 UserName 認證進行驗證。

trans-unit.source: This credential must be specified using <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> class.
trans-unit.target: 必須指定此認證，使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>類別。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] does not support sending a password digest or deriving keys using password and using such keys for message security.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]不支援傳送密碼摘要，或是衍生的金鑰使用的密碼，甚至對訊息安全性使用該金鑰。

trans-unit.source: As such, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] enforces that the exchange is secured when using UserName credentials.
trans-unit.target: 因此，[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]會強制使用 UserName 認證時，保護交換。

trans-unit.source: This mode requires that the service certificate be specified on the client using `ClientCredential` behavior and `serviceCertificate`: - `Certificate`: This allows the service to require that the client be authenticated using a certificate.
trans-unit.target: 此模式需要使用用戶端上指定服務憑證`ClientCredential`行為和`serviceCertificate`:- `Certificate`︰ 這可讓服務要求用戶端使用憑證來驗證。

trans-unit.source: The client credential in this case must be specified using <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> class or `ClientCredentials` behavior.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端認證在此情況下必須指定使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>類別或`ClientCredentials`行為。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>

trans-unit.source: The service credential in this case must be specified using <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> class or `ClientCredentials` behavior by specifying the `serviceCertificate`.
trans-unit.target: 服務認證在此情況下必須指定使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>類別或`ClientCredentials`行為藉由指定`serviceCertificate`。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>

trans-unit.source: - `InfoCard`: This allows the service to require that the client be authenticated using an InfoCard.
trans-unit.target: - `InfoCard`︰ 這可讓服務要求的用戶端使用 infocard 來進行驗證。

trans-unit.source: The `serviceCertificate` must be provisioned in the `ClientCredential` behavior.
trans-unit.target: `serviceCertificate`中必須提供`ClientCredential`行為。

trans-unit.source: - The Certificate credential for the `MessageSecurityOverMsmq` is relevant only when the security mode is set to `Both` or `Message`.
trans-unit.target: -的 Certificate 認證`MessageSecurityOverMsmq`無關只有當安全性模式設定為`Both`或`Message`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageCredentialType> security setting for messages sent over the MSMQ transport.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageCredentialType>透過 MSMQ 傳輸傳送之訊息的安全性設定。</xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageCredentialType>
